page.title: 06Transport Survey
page.content: {TRANSPORT SURVEY TAKEN OF 52 ADULTS {FROM THE DOMESDAY SURVEY AREA.} 1.Do you live in the village? YES=18 NO=34 2.Do you work? YES=38 NO=14 3.Do you work in Moniaive?YES=10 NO=28 4.How far do you travel to work? 0-5miles=10, 5-10miles=4, 10-15miles=4 15-20miles=8, MORE=2 5.If possible,would you work in the village? YES=16 NO=22 6.How do you travel to work? WALK=12, BIKE=2, BUS=0, CAR=23, MOTOR BIKE=3, VAN=2 7.How many cars does your family own? 0=2, 1=36, 2=11, 3=1, 4=1, MORE=1 8.What fuel does your car use?PETROL=49 DIESEL=3 9.Do you use POST BUS=12, SCHOOL BUS=7 SERVICE BUS 37 10.Do you use the bus EVERY DAY=4, ONCE/MONTH=4, LESS=22, NEVER=22
